properties.description:
1.	Build a pipeline wherein you need to ingest all the csv files from sftp which I received yesterday push them to landing in Blob and then to archive

a.	Make sure that the pipeline will not run more than one activity if there are no files
b.	 While moving to archive, Add an additional column(without using dataflows) called “Ingested_By” and pass your name. 
Also add one more column called “File Path” with the location of your file.
c.	The first 2 lines of the file being copied should not be ingested into landing
